posts.title: 乒乓
posts.text: 乒乓球的一个难点是做出的动作不是以为自己做出的。 从不知道到知道，从知道到做到，从做到到做好。

Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. 周六Create a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
